message: The list is crazy it is all his friends
yep, it's not just the cash it's the people and their contacts / pull that matters.

Rose went for the more-is-more approach, pulling in a wide-syndicate of Valley elites, including TechCrunch’s Michael Arrington.

Other angels include Ron Conway, Tim Ferriss, Dave Morin, Philip Rosedale, Evan Williams, Shervin Pishevar, Joshua Schachter, Anthony Casalena, Ashton Kutcher, Philip Kaplan, Chris Sacca, Gary Vanyerchuk, Tony Hsieh, Chamath Palihapitiya, Matt Mullenweg, Matt Williams, Tony Conrad and Rob Hayes.
sounds like it is going to be a great thing if he got all those angels, i am surprised Jason Calcanis didn't invest
This is true....I'm stoked to see what comes next
@justinluey adviser but not an investor those are two different things
I know. I was just pointing it out.
